sentence.Network_en: The courtier obeyed the king's orders in a complaisant manner.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Anglo-Norman French from Old French cortoyer 'be present at court', from cort (see court)

entry.def: Courtiers were noblemen and women who spent a lot of time at the court of a king or queen.

means.word_mean: 1. an attendant at the court of a sovereign
